name: It's Bomb
description:
‘It`s bomb’ is
‘It`s bomb’ is the game that challenges you to find deadly bombs that are hidden somewhere.
Take a chance and bet on your luck today.

====================================
Deadly bombs are hidden somewhere.
You are supposed to slowly and carefully identify the whereabouts of bombs and defuse them.
These bombs are not exploded if left untouched but will be blasted one after another with only a slight touch.
You are given quite a lot of time but you want to be as careful and meticulous as you can possibly be.
You may have to bet on your luck if time is right.
Let us defuse bombs as safely and quickly as possible as our colleagues around the globe are doing extremely fast.


New Puzzle =================================
This is a Bombs Searching Game that will meet your desire to face up new challenges by adopting a bold statistical factor while minimizing the complexity on how to play the game.

Fast Play ===================================
Winning the game depends on how fast you can clear from Stage One through Ten. You are going to have one more bomb added as you advance to the next stage, starting from Stage One with a single bomb all the way to Stage 10 with as many as 10 bombs.

Global Competition ============================
You are going to engage in competition against people around the world to accomplish the mission of clearing stages within the shortest possible time based on the global ranking system we have adopted.
